original_text: Now Eli was very old, and he kept hearing all that his sons were doing to all Israel, and how they lay with the women who were serving at the entrance to the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 엘리가 매우 늙었더니 그의 아들들이 온 이스라엘에게 행한 모든 일과 회막 문에서 수종 드는 여인들과 동침하였음을 듣고

sentences.original_text: all that his sons were doing to all Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 아들들이 온 이스라엘에게 행하는 모든 일

sentences.original_text: and how they lay with the women
who were serving at the entrance to the tent of meeting
